Description: Steatite shabti with incised decoration including a striped lappet-wig, a carved face, a collar and a lotiform pectoral, the hands in low-relief holding two low-relief hoes, the front of the legs are inscribed with five rows of incised hieroglyphs, a space has been left in the top row for the personal name, the back of one arm is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket, the foot is damaged.
